# dexidp Provider

Provision Dex resources via the Dex gRPC API.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "dexidp" {
  host = "127.0.0.1:5557"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String) The host and port of the Dex gRPC API.
